credit_line: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
title: Ostatnia noc Sokratesa [Last Night of Socretes], Teatr Nowy w Warszawie
description: Navy blue poster with black border. In center, a man's bearded face made out of rough spots of color in black, light blue and white. Across top in light blue, text reads: Teatr Nowy w Warszawie Stefan Canes." Across bottom in light blue, text reads: "Ostatnia noc Sokratesa."
name: Poster
